author: Eugene Kuleshov
comment: Would be nice to be able to customize text and background colors, as well as allow adding your own words. As well as color in the sleep mode. Next level would be changing words based on some triggers, eg home o'clock - geolocation, email o'clock - new email, walk o'clock - data from google fit, etc

author: Rachel Padden
comment: On my phone (Samsung S7) I can't actually open the app to change it from "something o'clock" to any of the other options. I like the idea, and it's a nice design, but obviously this could do with fixing!

reply.author: Styling Android
reply.content: Have you tried Going through the Wear app - it should be accessible via a 'cog' icon over the watch face.

title: Slight Problem
